summary: Once and Forever is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by Phil Goldstone and starring Patsy Ruth Miller, John Harron and Burr McIntosh.The film's sets were designed by the art director George Sawley.
cast:
Patsy Ruth Miller as Antoinette
John Harron as Georges
Burr McIntosh as Governor
Emily Fitzroy as Katherine
Adele Watson as Henriette
Vadim Uraneff as Axel
